law.catch_line: After making the distributions required under § 2-1101 of this subtitle, from the remaining motor f...
law.text: After making the distributions required under § 2-1101 of this subtitle, from the remaining motor fuel tax revenue, the Comptroller shall distribute the amount necessary to administer the Motor Fuel Tax Bureau of the Regulatory and Enforcement Division of the Comptroller's Office to an administrative cost account.
